name: top_js_ttt
description: A version of Tic-Tac-Toe build with JS
author: LPSV

scripts.uglify: uglifyjs src/js/*.js -m -o dist/js/app.js && uglifyjs src/js/*.js -m -c -o dist/js/app.min.js
scripts.build:css: npm run scss && npm run autoprefixer
scripts.build:js: npm run lint && npm run uglify
scripts.build:all: npm run build:css && npm run build:js
scripts.watch:all: parallelshell 'npm run serve' 'npm run watch:css' 'npm run watch:js'
